Package com.dacm.hexagonal.infrastructure.adapters.input.controller

Class SpaceController

java.lang.Object
com.dacm.hexagonal.infrastructure.adapters.input.controller.SpaceController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/v1/spaces") public class SpaceController extends Object
Controller for managing space-related operations. This class handles all incoming HTTP requests for creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting spaces.
See Also:
  • The service responsible for business logic associated with spaces.
  • The repository interface for space data persistence.
  • The entity model for a space.

      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the operation's ApiResponse.

      Creates multiple spaces at once and returns the operation result.
      Parameters:
      spaces - Array of space entities to create.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the operation's AddedResponse.

      @GetMapping("/find/{spaceId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<SpaceDto> findSpaceById(@PathVariable String spaceId)
      Retrieves a specific space by its ID.
      Parameters:
      spaceId - The ID of the space to find.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the found SpaceRecord.

    • findAllSpaces

      @GetMapping("/all") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<SpacePaginationResponse> findAllSpaces(@RequestParam(defaultValue="0") int page, @RequestParam(defaultValue="10") int size, @RequestParam(required=false) String spaceName, @RequestParam(required=false) String description, @RequestParam(required=false) String location, @RequestParam(required=false) String capacity)
      Fetches all spaces with optional filters and paginated results.
      Parameters:
      page - Default to 0, the page number of the paginated results.
      size - Default to 10, the size of the page to return.
      spaceName - Optional filter by space name.
      description - Optional filter by description.
      location - Optional filter by location.
      capacity - Optional filter by capacity.
      Returns:
      Paginated response of spaces.

    • findAvailableSpaces

      @GetMapping("/allAvailable") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<SpacePaginationResponse> findAvailableSpaces(@RequestParam(defaultValue="0") int page, @RequestParam(defaultValue="10") int size, @RequestParam(required=false) String spaceId, @RequestParam(required=false) String spaceName, @RequestParam(required=false) String description, @RequestParam(required=false) String location, @RequestParam(required=false) boolean available, @RequestParam(required=false) String capacity)
      Fetches all available spaces with optional filters and paginated results.
      Parameters:
      page - Default to 0, the page number of the paginated results.
      size - Default to 10, the size of the page to return.
      spaceId - Optional filter by space ID.
      spaceName - Optional filter by space name.
      description - Optional filter by description.
      location - Optional filter by location.
      available - Filter by availability status.
      capacity - Optional filter by capacity.
      Returns:
      Paginated response of available spaces.

    • findUnAvailableSpaces

      @GetMapping("/allUnAvailable") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<SpacePaginationResponse> findUnAvailableSpaces(@RequestParam(defaultValue="0") int page, @RequestParam(defaultValue="10") int size, @RequestParam(required=false) String spaceId, @RequestParam(required=false) String spaceName, @RequestParam(required=false) String description, @RequestParam(required=false) String location, @RequestParam(required=false) boolean available, @RequestParam(required=false) String capacity)
      Fetches all unavailable spaces with optional filters and paginated results.

      location - Optional filter by location.
      available - Filter by availability status.
      capacity - Optional filter by capacity.

      Paginated response of available spaces.

    • deleteSpace

      @DeleteMapping("/delete/{spaceId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ApiResponse> deleteSpace(@PathVariable String spaceId)
      Deletes a space by its ID.
      Parameters:
      spaceId - The ID of the space to delete.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the result of the deletion operation.

    • updateSpace

      Updates the details of an existing space.
      Parameters:
      spaceId - The ID of the space to update.
      spaceRecord - The updated details of the space.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the result of the update operation.
